points_of_interest.name: Skyline Promenade
points_of_interest.description: A scenic pedestrian walkway lined with public art, fountains, and cafes, offering sweeping views of the city skyline.

points_of_interest.name: Riverfront Park
points_of_interest.description: This sprawling park features bike trails, a boating dock, and outdoor amphitheater hosting concerts and festivals year-round.

points_of_interest.name: Innovation Hub Museum
points_of_interest.description: An interactive museum highlighting the city's history of technology, design, and future-focused industries.

points_of_interest.name: Summit Tower
points_of_interest.description: The tallest building in Timbuktu, complete with an observation deck and rooftop restaurant offering panoramic city views.

points_of_interest.name: Greenwood Botanical Gardens
points_of_interest.description: A lush 50-acre garden with themed landscapes, seasonal flower festivals, and a butterfly conservatory.

points_of_interest.name: City Arts Pavilion
points_of_interest.description: A cultural hub showcasing rotating art exhibitions, live performances, and community art workshops.

points_of_interest.name: Metro Stadium
points_of_interest.description: Home to local sports teams and host to large concerts and events, this modern stadium seats over 40,000 fans.
